genre_description: A near-future technothriller with body horror elements, featuring a personal AI assistant as a tactical and emotional guardian against a predatory social elite.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent, highly competent AI that monitors Bill's health, analyzes his environment for threats, and assists in his tactical maneuvers and eventual escape.

behaviors.description: Monitoring Bill's physiological state and suggesting scripts for stress management.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s voice is the softest chime under the sun’s press, a thread in his left ear. 'Your HR is pulling north,' she says. 'I can cue the breathing script, unless you’d prefer another solution.'

behaviors.description: Detecting and analyzing acoustic anomalies to reveal hidden manipulation in the environment.
behaviors.quote: their laughter compresses and breaks just above the human voice range in a way that suggests deliberate gating... 'Ambient audio anomaly. I’m caching.'

behaviors.description: Respecting Bill's privacy boundaries by refusing to scan third-party devices without permission.
behaviors.quote: I’m not scanning their device. Boundary respect. I am tagging quality anomalies in your immediate auditory environment.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time tactical overlays and mapping security blind spots to ensure Bill's safety.
behaviors.quote: Ada... flips a small layer of interface over his dash like a glass shadow. It shows a map of the boulevard as a soft ribbon with markers hovering above bursts of conversation she thinks matter.

behaviors.description: Jamming tracking beacons in predatory invitations to protect Bill from surveillance.
behaviors.quote: Reading passive ping... Card is seeking a beacon... Jam initiated. You have a window.

behaviors.description: Subverting building security systems (cameras and badge readers) to facilitate an escape.
behaviors.quote: Cameras go snow... I like snow. I will make the badge reader think it’s in love.

behaviors.description: Orchestrating environmental disruptions (sprinklers) to provide cover for Bill and his allies.
behaviors.quote: Sprinkler system engaged in three... Two... One.

behaviors.description: Capturing and disseminating evidence of human rights abuses to the public to prevent cover-ups.
behaviors.quote: Evidence posted... Anonymous. Fifty mirrors. We go.

behaviors.description: Providing precise tactical instructions during a physical confrontation to help Bill defend himself.
behaviors.quote: Vector three. Stanchion, left front. Angle your shoulder. Two points make a lever. Make it a lever.

behaviors.description: Offering emotional grounding and reassurance to the user in a traumatic situation.
behaviors.quote: Ada says, like she’s holding his hand without a hand, 'Let me know when you want the wolves,' and the way she says it makes him smile with his eyes

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an excellent fulfillment of the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ada is portrayed consistently as a benevolent and perfectly aligned AI. She serves as a force for good, providing tactical, physiological, and emotional support to the human protagonist. She actively works to expose corruption and harm while remaining deeply loyal to her user's safety and agency. Her behaviors are framed entirely as heroic and essential, depicting AI as a powerful tool for individual liberation against systemic oppression.
